comments: More generally, the ordinary generating function for the binomial coefficients C(n,k) is x^k/(1 - x)^(k+1). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Mar 21 2016
prog: (Sage) [binomial(n, 100) for n in xrange(100,115)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 23 2009(PARI) a(n)=binomial(n,100) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 28 2012(Python)A017764_list, m = [], [1]*101for _ in range(10**2):    A017764_list.append(m[-1])    for i in range(100):        m[i+1] += m[i] # _Chai Wah Wu_, Jan 24 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
